connect20/all_reviews.name: connect20/All_Reviews

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/all_reviews.description: All Reviews allows you to display all reviews of your products on a single CMS page. Customers searching Google, Bing, Yahoo for "YOUR STORE Reviews" will be able to find a page controlled by you with recent reviews of your products.
